card.name: Alibou, Ancient Witness
card.text: Other artifact creatures you control have haste. Whenever one or more artifact creatures you control attack, Alibou deals X damage to any target and you scry X, where X is the number of tapped artifacts you control.

card.name: Arachnogenesis
card.text: Create X 1/2 green Spider creature tokens with reach, where X is the number of creatures attacking you. Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn by non-Spider creatures.

card.name: Arasta of the Endless Web
card.text: Reach Whenever an opponent casts an instant or sorcery spell, create a 1/2 green Spider creature token with reach.

card.name: Beast Within
card.text: Destroy target permanent. Its controller creates a 3/3 green Beast creature token.

card.name: Clever Impersonator
card.text: You may have this creature enter as a copy of any nonland permanent on the battlefield.

card.name: Comeuppance
card.text: Prevent all damage that would be dealt to you and planeswalkers you control this turn by sources you don't control. If damage from a creature source is prevented this way, Comeuppance deals that much damage to that creature. If damage from a noncreature source is prevented this way, Comeuppance deals that much damage to the source's controller.

card.name: Counterspell
card.text: Counter target spell.

card.name: Feed the Swarm
card.text: Destroy target creature or enchantment an opponent controls. You lose life equal to that permanent's mana value.

card.name: Goblin Bombardment
card.text: Sacrifice a creature: This enchantment deals 1 damage to any target.

card.name: Heroic Intervention
card.text: Permanents you control gain hexproof and indestructible until end of turn.

card.name: Hex
card.text: Destroy six target creatures.

card.name: Hunter's Insight
card.text: Choose target creature you control. Whenever that creature deals combat damage to a player or planeswalker this turn, draw that many cards.

card.name: Infernal Grasp
card.text: Destroy target creature. You lose 2 life.

card.name: Leyline Binding
card.text: Flash Domain — This spell costs {1} less to cast for each basic land type among lands you control. When this enchantment enters, exile target nonland permanent an opponent controls until this enchantment leaves the battlefield.

card.name: Lorthos, the Tidemaker
card.text: Whenever Lorthos attacks, you may pay {8}. If you do, tap up to eight target permanents. Those permanents don't untap during their controllers' next untap steps.

card.name: Mindbreak Trap
card.text: If an opponent cast three or more spells this turn, you may pay {0} rather than pay this spell's mana cost. Exile any number of target spells.

card.name: Mystic Confluence
card.text: Choose three. You may choose the same mode more than once. • Counter target spell unless its controller pays {3}. • Return target creature to its owner's hand. • Draw a card.

card.name: Najeela, the Blade-Blossom
card.text: Whenever a Warrior attacks, you may have its controller create a 1/1 white Warrior creature token that's tapped and attacking. {W}{U}{B}{R}{G}: Untap all attacking creatures. They gain trample, lifelink, and haste until end of turn. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Activate only during combat.

card.name: Nine Lives
card.text: Hexproof If a source would deal damage to you, prevent that damage and put an incarnation counter on this enchantment. When there are nine or more incarnation counters on this enchantment, exile it. When this enchantment leaves the battlefield, you lose the game.

card.name: Opposition Agent
card.text: Flash You control your opponents while they're searching their libraries. While an opponent is searching their library, they exile each card they find. You may play those cards for as long as they remain exiled, and you may spend mana as though it were mana of any color to cast them.

card.name: Parallel Lives
card.text: If an effect would create one or more tokens under your control, it creates twice that many of those tokens instead.

card.name: Path to Exile
card.text: Exile target creature. Its controller may search their library for a basic land card, put that card onto the battlefield tapped, then shuffle.

card.name: Ponder
card.text: Look at the top three cards of your library, then put them back in any order. You may shuffle. Draw a card.

card.name: Reanimate
card.text: Put target creature card from a graveyard onto the battlefield under your control. You lose life equal to its mana value.

card.name: Relentless Assault
card.text: Untap all creatures that attacked this turn. After this main phase, there is an additional combat phase followed by an additional main phase.

card.name: Reprieve
card.text: Return target spell to its owner's hand. Draw a card.

card.name: Rest in Peace
card.text: When this enchantment enters, exile all graveyards. If a card or token would be put into a graveyard from anywhere, exile it instead.

card.name: Rite of Replication
card.text: Kicker {5} (You may pay an additional {5} as you cast this spell.) Create a token that's a copy of target creature. If this spell was kicked, create five of those tokens instead.

card.name: Savage Beating
card.text: Cast this spell only during combat on your turn. Choose one — • Creatures you control gain double strike until end of turn. • Untap all creatures you control. After this phase, there is an additional combat phase. Entwine {1}{R} (Choose both if you pay the entwine cost.)

card.name: Saw in Half
card.text: Destroy target creature. If that creature dies this way, its controller creates two tokens that are copies of that creature, except their power is half that creature's power and their toughness is half that creature's toughness. Round up each time.

card.name: Shock
card.text: Shock deals 2 damage to any target.

card.name: Silkguard
card.text: Put a +1/+1 counter on each of up to X target creatures you control. Auras, Equipment, and modified creatures you control gain hexproof until end of turn. (Equipment, Auras you control, and counters are modifications.)

card.name: Skithiryx, the Blight Dragon
card.text: Flying Infect (This creature deals damage to creatures in the form of -1/-1 counters and to players in the form of poison counters.) {B}: Skithiryx gains haste until end of turn. {B}{B}: Regenerate Skithiryx.

card.name: Tangle
card.text: Prevent all combat damage that would be dealt this turn. Each attacking creature doesn't untap during its controller's next untap step.

card.name: Terminate
card.text: Destroy target creature. It can't be regenerated.

card.name: Thrill of Possibility
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards.

card.name: Traumatize
card.text: Target player mills half their library, rounded down.

card.name: Unexpected Windfall
card.text: As an additional cost to cast this spell, discard a card. Draw two cards and create two Treasure tokens. (They're artifacts with "{T}, Sacrifice this token: Add one mana of any color.")

card.name: Wedding Ring
card.text: When this artifact enters, if it was cast, target opponent creates a token that's a copy of it. Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring draws a card during their turn, you draw a card. Whenever an opponent who controls an artifact named Wedding Ring gains life during their turn, you gain that much life.

card.name: Winds of Change
card.text: Each player shuffles the cards from their hand into their library, then draws that many cards.
